chunks.text: In the shadows of the night, you might say I've got nowhere to hide, nowhere to run, and if I try to move a little too fast, you might think that I'll trip and fall that I might lose my path
But I know that way now
And I think I'll find it back
When you caught in the storm
Do you fall to the ground
Do you sit there and pray that you'll make it sound?
Or do you fight harder than you can?
Catching at the light,
this is right through your hands? We all know what is like to see what it's like to feel small underneath the stars Underneath the sky
And we are
But we're braver than we think
Holding swords right towards their hearts
Free and safe at last
And the time that is lost, we're never getting back
When you're caught in the storm, do you fall to the ground?
Do you sit there and pray that you'll make it sound, or do you fight
Harder than you can, catching at the light,
just this right through your hands.
And when all the hope is lost, you can make your final stand.
When you're caught in the storm, do you fall to the ground?
Do you sit there and pray that you'll make it sound?
Or do you fight harder than you can? Do you sit there and pray that you'll make it sound?
Or do you fight harder than you can?
Catching at the light that slips into your hands,
you've got it now, you'll be fine.
You'll be fine, you'll be fine, you've got it now.
It's the time.
Ooh, ooh.

Or do you fight harder than you can? Catching at the light, this is right through your hands? We all know what is like to see what it's like to feel small underneath the stars Underneath the sky And we are But we're braver than we think Holding swords right towards their hearts Free and safe at last And the time that is lost, we're never getting back When you're caught in the storm, do you fall to the ground? Do you sit there and pray that you'll make it sound, or do you fight Harder than you can, catching at the light, just this right through your hands. And when all the hope is lost, you can make your final stand. When you're caught in the storm, do you fall to the ground? Do you sit there and pray that you'll make it sound? Or do you fight harder than you can? Do you sit there and pray that you'll make it sound? Or do you fight harder than you can? Catching at the light that slips into your hands, you've got it now, you'll be fine. You'll be fine, you'll be fine, you've got it now. It's the time. Ooh, ooh.
